statements.statements: for $L.i = 1 to lng($L.format.fields) do (if (8 in $L.i in $L.format.fields="") then (8 in $L.i in $L.format.fields=NULL))

for $L.i = 1 to lng($L.format.fields) do (if (not (null(8 in $L.i in $L.format.fields)) and 8 in $L.i in $L.format.fields~="" and (null($L.file.name) or substr(8 in $L.i in $L.format.fields, 1, 1)="$")) then if (4 in $L.i in $L.format.fields=17) then (if (index(8 in $L.i in $L.format.fields, $L.17)=0) then ($L.17=$L.17+{8 in $L.i in $L.format.fields})) else if (4 in $L.i in $L.format.fields=14) then (if (index(8 in $L.i in $L.format.fields, $L.14)=0) then ($L.14=$L.14+{8 in $L.i in $L.format.fields})) else (if (4 in $L.i in $L.format.fields=8) then if (index(8 in $L.i in $L.format.fields, $L.8)=0) then ($L.8=$L.8+{8 in $L.i in $L.format.fields})))

for $L.i = 1 to lng($L.format.fields) do (if (not (null(8 in $L.i in $L.format.fields)) and 8 in $L.i in $L.format.fields~="" and (null($L.file.name) or substr(8 in $L.i in $L.format.fields, 1, 1)="$")) then if (index("MaxChars=17", 11 in $L.i in $L.format.fields)>0) then (if (index(8 in $L.i in $L.format.fields, $L.17)=0) then ($L.17=$L.17+{8 in $L.i in $L.format.fields})) else if (index("MaxChars=14", 11 in $L.i in $L.format.fields)>0) then (if (index(8 in $L.i in $L.format.fields, $L.14)=0) then ($L.14=$L.14+{8 in $L.i in $L.format.fields})) else (if (index("MaxChars=8", 11 in $L.i in $L.format.fields)>0) then if (index(8 in $L.i in $L.format.fields, $L.8)=0) then ($L.8=$L.8+{8 in $L.i in $L.format.fields})))
for $L.i = 1 to lng($L.17) do (if ($L.i in $L.17="" or null($L.i in $L.17)) then ($L.17=delete($L.17, $L.i);if (lng(denull($L.17))>0) then $L.i-=1) else ($L.8={}))
for $L.i = 1 to lng($L.14) do (if ($L.i in $L.17="" or null($L.i in $L.14)) then ($L.14=delete($L.14, $L.i);if (lng(denull($L.14))>0) then $L.i-=1) else ($L.8={}))
for $L.i = 1 to lng($L.8) do (if ($L.i in $L.17="" or null($L.i in $L.8)) then ($L.8=delete($L.8, $L.i);if (lng(denull($L.8))>0) then $L.i-=1) else ($L.8={}))
